Index >  ImageLayoutPageNumber

ImageLayoutPageNumber

Description

Returns the page number of the current image. This is a read-only property.

Data type

<int>

Syntax

.ImageLayoutPageNumber;

Remarks

Increment for each page fed from a page feeder.

ImageLayoutPageNumber property, along with other properties about the current image information, is valid only in OnPreTransfer and OnPostTransfer event.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

ImageLayoutFrameLeft
ImageLayoutFrameTop
ImageLayoutFrameRight
ImageLayoutFrameBottom
ImageLayoutDocumentNumber
ImageLayoutFrameNumber
